items.sentence: Tom thought Mary was hiding something from him.
Perhaps Tom and Mary will become close friends.
I was going to buy it, only Tom told me not to.
I came here to warn you that you\'re in danger.
I can\'t believe everything that just happened.
I don\'t think that Tom would like living here.
Tom likes wearing white socks with his sandals.
How much do you usually spend when you eat out?
How often do you go swimming with your friends?
How old were you the first time you drank wine?
